name: Tellurean Dungeons
description:
Had a last minute problem and uploaded the wrong build.

The levers and the jumping weren't working, so it was impossible to finish the 2nd and 3rd levels.

This is the correct one if anyone wants to check it out:

https://drive.google.com/file/d/19K78S6fmAzfunS-OIC4vwD34ClJzvILz/view?usp=shari...

Thanks for playing!
